definition: Kim Dae-jung (1926-2009), South Korea politician, president 1998-2003, Nobel peace prize laureate 2000
surname Jin/surname Kim (Korean)/Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
within/among/in/middle/center/while (doing sth)/during/(dialect) OK/all right
China/Chinese/surname Zhong

sentences.english: THE mood among mourners is appropriately sombre.
sentences.chinese: 金大中送葬者的情绪确实悲痛。

sentences.english: The children of Kim Dae-jung and Kim Young-sam went to jail for graft.
sentences.chinese: 金大中及金泳三的孩子都曾因受贿而入狱。

sentences.english: But in the past decade it has weakened under the successive administrations of Kim Dae-jung and Roh Moo-hyun.
sentences.chinese: 但在过去十年，在金大中和卢武铉政府下遭到削弱。

sentences.english: Mr. Kim was born on Dec. 3, 1925 to a farming family.
sentences.chinese: 1925年12月3日，金大中生于一个农民家庭。

sentences.english: In 1997 Mr Roh organised Mr Kim's successful presidential campaign.
sentences.chinese: 1997年，卢为金大中成功的组织了总统竞选活动。

sentences.english: The hospital president, Dr. Park Chang-il, says Mr. Kim died of multiple organ failure.
sentences.chinese: 医院院长朴昌一大夫说，金大中死于多器官功能衰竭。

sentences.english: The agreement, however, went missing during the Kim Dae-jung and Roh Moo-hyun administrations.
sentences.chinese: 然而，该协议在金大中和卢武铉政府期间丢失了。

sentences.english: Kim Dae-Jung was made the 15th president of Korea.
sentences.chinese: 金大中当选韩国第15届总统。

sentences.english: WESTLIFE sends their congratulations to President Kim Daejung on winning the Nobel Peace prize.
sentences.chinese: 西城男孩向金大中主席恭贺他获得诺贝尔和平奖。

sentences.english: That caught the attention of South Korea's best known political figure, Kim Dae-jung.
sentences.chinese: 这些举动引起了韩国最著名的政治人物金大中的注意。

sentences.english: President Kim Dae-jung of ROK, the host country presided over the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 此次会议由东道国韩国总统金大中主持。

sentences.english: Ex-S. Korean President Kim Dae-jung dead at 85 .
sentences.chinese: 韩国前总统金大中因心脏衰竭去世，享年85岁。

sentences.english: At left, Mr. Kim speaking during a protest in 1969.
sentences.chinese: 本图为1969年，金大中在一次抗议活动中演讲。

sentences.english: This would have pleased Kim Dae-jung no end.
sentences.chinese: 这会相当的取悦金大中。

sentences.english: Former South Korean President Kim Dae-jung has died in Seoul at the age of 85.
sentences.chinese: 韩国前总统金大中在首尔去世，终年85岁。

sentences.english: "Kim Dae-Jung's greatest political capital was his persecution, " said Shim Jae-hoon.
sentences.chinese: 金大中的最大政治资本是他受到的迫害。

definition: Kim Young-sam (1927-), South Korean politician, president 1993-1998
Roh Moo-hyun (1946-2009), South Korean lawyer and politician, president 2003-2008
Roh Tae-woo (1932-), South Korean politician, president 1988-1993
Chun Doo Hwan (1931-), South Korean politician, president 1980-1988
Park Chung-Hee (1917-1979), South Korean military man and dictator, president 1963-1979, influential in developing Korean industry, murdered by his bodyguard
Lee Myung-bak (1941-), South Korean businessman, one-time chairman of Hyundai, president of South Korea 2008-2013
Syngman Rhee (1875-1965), US trained Korean politician and dictator, president of Republic of Korea 1948-1960
Moon Jae-in (1953-), Korean politician and human rights lawyer, president of Korea from 2017
former president
KOIZUMI Jun'ichirō (1942-), Japanese LDP politician, prime minister 2001-2006
Ban Ki Moon (1944-), Korean diplomat, UN secretary-general 2007-2016
Park Geun-hye (1952-), Korean politician, daughter of former dictator Park Chung-Hee 朴正熙[Piao2 Zheng4 xi1], president of Korea 2013-2017
president (of a country)/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2],屆|届[jie4]
Suharto (1921-2008), former Indonesian general, president of the Republic of Indonesia 1967-1998
Blue House (Cheong Wa Dae), residence of the president of South Korea in Seoul
South Korean Grand national party
